title: Sell Hibiki
metaDescription: Sell your Hibiki whisky to Proof Cellars. We buy 17, 21, 30 year, and Japanese Harmony limited editions. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Hibiki directly - from aged expressions to limited editions.
introParagraph: Hibiki is Suntory's flagship blended whisky, known for its elegant 24-faceted bottle and harmonious flavor. We buy Hibiki directly, including the sought-after 17, 21, and 30 Year expressions. Submit photos and details to receive an offer.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Items we cannot legally purchase in your state
photoChecklist: Front label showing age statement or edition
Fill level visible in the bottle
conditionFactors: Fill level should be at or near original
Seal must be intact - authenticity concerns are common
The distinctive bottle should be undamaged
pricingFactors: Limited edition or special release status

faqs.question: Which Hibiki expressions do you buy?
faqs.answer: We buy Hibiki 17, 21, and 30 Year expressions, as well as limited editions like Blossom Harmony. Standard Japanese Harmony is widely available and typically does not meet our criteria.

faqs.question: Why is aged Hibiki so valuable?
faqs.answer: Hibiki 17 Year was discontinued and 21 Year has become extremely scarce. Limited production of aged whisky has driven strong collector interest.

faqs.question: Do you verify Hibiki authenticity?
faqs.answer: Yes. Japanese whisky has high counterfeiting rates. We carefully review photos and conduct full verification during physical inspection.

faqs.question: Does the box add value?
faqs.answer: Yes. Original Hibiki boxes add significant value. The presentation packaging is part of the collectible appeal.

faqs.question: Is my Hibiki 17 Year authentic?
faqs.answer: Send photos and we will review for authenticity indicators. Full verification happens during physical inspection.

faqs.question: How quickly will I receive an offer?
faqs.answer: We typically respond within one business day for Hibiki submissions.

faqs.question: What is Hibiki Blossom Harmony?
faqs.answer: Hibiki Blossom Harmony is a limited edition featuring sakura cask finishing. These seasonal releases are collectible.

faqs.question: Do older Hibiki bottles have more value?
faqs.answer: Older bottlings, especially with vintage packaging, may have additional collectible value. Send photos for evaluation.
